articles.title: Who’s behind AMI Labs, Yann LeCun’s ‘world model’ startup
articles.description: Yann LeCun's new venture, AMI Labs, has drawn intense attention since the AI scientist left Meta to found it.
articles.summary: AI pioneer Yann LeCun announces his latest startup after leaving Facebook's parent company.
points: Yann LeCun has founded AMI Labs following a departure from Meta (formerly known as Facebook).
The technology behind the new venture is described as 'world modeling', which focuses on using artificial intelligence to understand and simulate complex systems.
AMI Lab'tself-proclaimed mission involves creating innovative AI technologies with a strong emphasis on ethical considerations, especially regarding privacy.
articles.insight: Yann LeCun’s departure from Meta could signal major shifts in the landscape of artificial intelligence research and development. His new venture's focus on 'world modeling', coupled with a strong emphasis on ethics, has potential implications for how AI will be used responsibly.

articles.title: Waymo probed by National Transportation Safety Board over illegal school bus behavior
articles.description: The NTSB joins the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration in investigating Waymo vehicles illegally passing stopped school buses.
articles.summary: Waymo is under investigation by federal agencies for its self-driving cars' illegal behavior of passing stopped school buses without following the necessary safety protocols.
points: The National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) and the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration are investigating Waymo vehicles in Arizona that passed a school bus illegally, according to media reports citing officials at NTSB.
According to KJR Radio’in an interview with one of the parents whose child was hit by such vehicle near their home on March 27th
The self-driving Waymo car allegedly did not follow required safety procedures for passing a stopped school bus.
articles.insight: This incident could lead to stricter regulations and scrutiny of autonomous vehicles' adherence to traffic laws, impact the perceptions of self-driving technology in public eye especially around children's safety areas.

articles.title: The Rippling/Deel corporate spying scandal may have taken another wild turn
articles.description: The Department of Justice may be conducting a criminal investigation. This is arguably the biggest drama between two HR startups ever.
articles.summary: HR startup Rippling was accused in an elaborate corporate espionage scandal involving its chief competitor, Deel; allegations include theft and misuse of proprietary information.
points: The Department of Justice is investigating a corporate spying case that may implicate multiple parties within tech HR sectors.
Deel'curent CEO has been accused by Rippling, claiming theft and misuse of proprietary information.
This scandal exposes potential vulnerabilities in company-to-company relationships among startups.
articles.insight: The implications for HR tech companies include heightened scrutiny on inter-company data handling practices, which might lead to stricter compliance measures and corporate policies regarding proprietary information protection. The fallout may influence how these businesses approach competition and collaboration.

articles.title: What to know about Netflix’s landmark acquisition of Warner Bros.
articles.description: Learn more about Netflix's acquisition of Warner Bros., considered the most historic megadeal in Hollywood, as it continues to develop.
articles.summary: Netflix has announced a landmark deal acquiring streaming rights for DC movies and television series from Warner Bros., marking the largest single-platform content purchase in entertainment history.
points: The acquisition between Netflix and Warner Bros. involves purchasing exclusive worldwide distribution, including DVDs, of nearly all existing and future Warner Bros.-DC films for a reported $2 billion over five years.
This deal extends to DC television series like 'Black Lightning,' as well as upcoming movies such as the live-action Batgirl film which was previously announced at CinemaCon in September 2de
The acquisition is expected to be completed next year and will give Netflix a unique competitive edge with exclusive content, including DC's most iconic characters.
articles.insight: Netflix acquiring Warner Bros. rights could significantly change the landscape of streaming services by consolidating high-profile film and series deals for one platform, potentially leading to higher viewership numbers due to exclusive content accessibility.

articles.title: Researchers say Russian government hackers were behind attempted Poland power outage
articles.description: Security researchers have attributed the attempted use of destructive "wiper" malware across Poland's energy infrastructure in late December to a Russian-backed hacking group known for causing power outages in neighboring Ukraine.
articles.summary: Security researchers have identified the attempted deployment of destructive 'wiper' malware on Poland'nergy infrastructure as actions by a Russian-backed hacking group linked to prior power outages in Ukraine.
points: A Russian-backed hacker group, previously responsible for causing blackouts in Ukraine, is suspected of targeting Polish energy systems with 'wiper' malware late December
The cyber threat actors have been termed as REvil or Sodinok Devil by some security researchers.
Government response and prevention measures are being evaluated.
articles.insight: This event raises significant concerns about the vulnerability of national critical infrastructure to state-sponsored cyberattacks, prompting a reassessment of global IT security strategies in this domain.

articles.title: How did Davos turn into a tech conference?
articles.description: The World Economic Forum’s annual meeting in Davos felt different this year, and not just because Meta and Salesforce took over storefronts on the main promenade. AI dominated the conversation in a way that overshadowed traditional topics like climate change and global poverty, and the CEOs weren’t holding back. There was public criticism of trade policy, warnings about AI […]
articles.summary: The World Economic Forum'table annual Davos meeting experienced a shift in focus towards technology and artificial intelligence (AI), even overshadowing traditional topics like climate change and global poverty.
points: - The role of AI was prominently featured at the WEF Annual Meeting, leading to intense discussions among CEOs about its future impacts
- There were concerns raised regarding trade policy during the event amidst an environment that heavily favored technological advancements and digital economies
The public criticism of current state-centric approaches in favor of more digitally integrated, collaborative strategies was evident among participants
articles.insight: - The prominence given to AI at this year's Davos indicates a significant shift towards the prioritization and potential dominance of technological advancements over traditional global issues. This could lead to an intensification in investments, innovation efforts as well as regulatory measures concerning technology.

articles.title: Google Photos’ latest feature lets you meme yourself
articles.description: The new feature lets you insert yourself into a meme in Google Photos.
articles.summary: Google has introduced a new personalization update to its photo service that allows users to embed themselves within memes.
points: The latest feature in Google Photos lets users insert images of themself into various meme formats, including classic and GIF animations.
articles.insight: This personalization update could enhance user engagement with the service while also providing a unique tool for digital self-expression within memes. It potentially opens up discussions on privacy concerns related to facial recognition technology in social media platforms, which is an aspect that Google and other tech companies will likely need to address.

articles.title: Meta pauses teen access to AI characters ahead of new version
articles.description: Meta today said that it is pausing teens' access to its AI characters globally across all its apps. The company mentioned that it is not abandoning its efforts but wants to develop an updated version of AI characters for teens.
articles.summary: Meta today said that it is pausing teens' access to its AI characters globally across all its apps. The company mentioned that it is not abandoning its efforts but wants to develop an updated version of AI characters for teens
points: Meta today said that it is pausing teens' access to its AI characters globally across all its apps
The company mentioned that it is not abandoning its efforts but wants to develop an updated version ...
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: Here’s what you should know about the US TikTok deal
articles.description: A number of investors are competing for the opportunity to purchase the app, and if a deal were to go through, the platform's U.S. business could have its valuation soar to upward of $60 billion.
articles.summary: Investors are bidding for US TikTok shares with the potential deal's outcome raising platform value significantly.
points: Several investors have expressed interest in purchasing part or all of TikTok, potentially valuing it at $60 billion if acquired by a U.S company.
The US government is concerned about data privacy and national security risks associated with the Chinese-owned platform within its borders.
A possible deal could involve transferring certain operations or user data to ensure compliance with American regulations.
articles.insight: This news underscores ongoing concerns over data sovereignty and highlights potential regulatory changes affecting foreign tech companies operating within the U.S, which may encourage global businesses to consider reassessment of their presence in markets like America.

articles.title: This startup will send 1,000 people’s ashes to space — affordably — in 2027
articles.description: Started by an engineer who worked on the space shuttle program, and at Blue Origin, Space Beyond has a spot on a 2027 Falcon 9 flight.
articles.summary: Space Beyond is an affordable service starting in 2027 to send the ashes of deceased loved ones into space aboard a Falcon 9 rocket.
points: Company was founded by former engineer involved with NASA and Blue Origin
Aims for mass market appeal, offering memorial services at $400 per ticket starting in 2027
Plan to provide eulogies or commemorations via live feed during the ashes' journey
articles.insight: The service reflects a growing trend of personalization within space tourism and memorial services, potentially expanding customer bases beyond affluent demographics.

articles.title: Microsoft gave FBI a set of BitLocker encryption keys to unlock suspects’ laptops: Reports
articles.description: The FBI served Microsoft a warrant requesting encryption recovery keys to decrypt the hard drives of people involved in an alleged fraud case in Guam.
articles.summary: Microsoft received a court order from the FBI for BitLocker encryption keys needed to access laptops related to a potential fraud case.
points: The FBI has requested Microsoft's assistance with decrypting hard drives in an alleged Guam-based fraud investigation.
articles.insight: This news may signal increased scrutinization of digital evidence and raise concerns over privacy implications when technology companies cooperate with law enforcement agencies seeking access to encrypted data.

articles.title: TikTok-like microdramas are going to make billions this year, even though they kind of suck
articles.description: The business model behind these apps replicates the same dark patterns as mobile games.
articles.summary: TikTok-like microdramas are predicted to generate billions in revenue this year despite their unappealing nature.
points: The business model of TikTok and similar apps is replicating dark patterns found in mobile games, creating addictive user experiences at the expense of content quality.
Despite often being criticized as shallow or 'suckable,' these platforms continue to thrive financially due to their engaging yet potentially harmful design elements.
The dichotomy between monetization strategies and artistic integrity in digital entertainment raises questions about user well-being.
articles.insight: This trend highlights a growing concern over the prioritization of profitability over content quality, with potential implications for consumer behavior and industry standards regarding ethical design choices.

articles.title: TikTok finalizes deal to create new US entity and avoid ban
articles.description: The deal ends a six-year long political saga that started in 2020 when President Donald Trump tried to ban the app over national security concerns during his first term.
articles.summary: The deal ends a six-year long political saga that started in 2020 when President Donald Trump tried to ban the app over national security concerns during his first term
points: Important changes and trends in the IT industry
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: OpenAI chief Sam Altman plans India visit as AI leaders converge in New Delhi: sources
articles.description: The visit comes as New Delhi prepares to host a major AI summit expected to draw top executives from Meta, Google, and Anthropic. This will be Altman's first visit to the country in nearly a year.
articles.summary: Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, plans his first trip back to India since April 2021 for an AI summit set to convene top executives from Meta, Google, and Anthropic in New Delhi.
points: New Delhi is preparing for a major Artificial Intelligence (AI) summit expected to attract leading figures like Sam Altman of OpenAI.
The event will bring together top AI executives from companies such as Meta, Google, and Anthropic.
Sam Altman's trip marks his first visit back to India since April 2021.
articles.insight: Altman's planned return underscores the importance of collaboration in advancing AI technology globally. The convergence at New Delhi for this summit may signal a shift towards more inclusive and diverse representation within AI leadership circles, potentially impacting future global strategies.

articles.title: Only 1 week left (or until the first 500 passes are gone): The first TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket discount is ending
articles.description: Register now to save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 pass and get a second ticket at 50% off. This offer ends next week on January 30, or once the first 500 tickets are claimed — whichever comes first.
articles.summary: TechCrunch Disrupt has introduced a limited-time discount offer on its passes for their event in January 2026 until the end of next week or once the first 500 tickets are sold out.
points: The TechCrunch Disrupt pass registration offers up to $680 savings with an additional ticket at half price, but is only valid for one week and a cap on discounted passes applies until they sell the first 500 tickets.

Ticketholders have been provided with specific terms that define how their funds can be used to pay for registration, transportation costs (with some exclusions), meal service fees or other services related directly to attending the event in San Francisco on January 6-9, 2026.
The promotional offer was announced via email by TechCrunch Disrupt and awaits further details regarding its execution.
articles.insight: This limited time ticket discount drive is indicative of an effort to ensure high attendance for the upcoming event, possibly reflecting on-demand interest in tech industry gatherings. It underscores TechCrunch Disrupt's role as a catalyst within Silicon Valley networking.

articles.title: Tesla discontinues Autopilot in bid to boost adoption of its Full Self-Driving software
articles.description: The company is also currently facing a 30-day suspension of its manufacturing and dealer licenses in California for deceptive marketing about Autopilot's capabilities.
articles.summary: Tesla is discontinuing the use of Autopilot to encourage adoption of its Full Self-Driving software amid regulatory scrutiny and safety concerns.
points: Regulators are investigating Tesla's marketing claims about the capabilities of Autopilot, leading to a temporary license suspension in California.
Tesla plans to phase out its own driver assistance systems (like Autosteer and Smart Summon) over time while focusing on Full Self-Driving technology development.
Full Self-Driving software is expected to take more control from human drivers, aiming for hands-off driving experiences in certain conditions.
articles.insight: Tesla's move signifies a strategic shift towards prioritizing the Full Self-Driving (FSD) technology amidst regulatory and safety challenges facing its previous driver assistance programs, which could redefine automotive industry standards for self-driving capabilities.

articles.title: 대전시교육청, 어린이 안전 위해 ‘아동보호구역 지정 및 CCTV 설치 확대’ 협의
articles.description: 어린이 등하굣길 안전 확보, 유관기관 협력체계 구축[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 대전시교육청은 22일 본청 재난안전상황실에서 ‘아동보호구역 지정 및 CCTV 설치 확대를 위한 관계기관 실무협의회’를 개최했다고 밝혔다.이번 실무협의회는 관계부처 합동 ‘어린이 등하굣길 안전확보 종합대책’과 대전시교육청의 ‘학생 유괴 대응 방안’ 추진 과제 중 하나인 아동보호구역 지

articles.title: ‘중소기업 기술탈취 대응 강화’... 6개 부처 범부처 대응단 출범
articles.description: 중기부·산업부·공정위·지재처·경찰청·국정원 등 6대 기술보호 핵심 부처 합동기술탈취 피해기업 회복, 기술보호 관련 제도 개선 논의... 부처 간 협업 강화[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 중소벤처기업부(장관 한성숙)는 기술 탈취 피해 중소기업을 신속히 구제하고 기술보호 제도 사각지대를 해소하기 위해 관계부처 합동으로 ‘중소기업 기술탈취 근절 범부처 대응단’을 신설하
articles.summary: 중기부·산업부·공정위·지재처·경찰청·국정원 등 6대 기술보호 핵심 부처 합동기술탈취 피해기업 회복, 기술보호 관련 제도 개선 논의. 부처 간 협업 강화[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 중소벤처기업부(장관 한성숙)는 기술 탈취 피해 중소기업을 신속히 구제하고 기술보호 제도 사각지대를 해소하기 위해 관계부처 합동으로 ‘중소기업 기술탈취 근절 범부처 대응단’을 신설하
points: 중기부·산업부·공정위·지재처·경찰청·국정원 등 6대 기술보호 핵심 부처 합동기술탈취 피해기업 회복, 기술보호 관련 제도 개선 논의

articles.title: 개인정보위, 자율주행 AI 데이터 규제 푼다
articles.description: 송경희 위원장, 개인정보 규제합리화 현장 간담회자율주행 AI 성능 향상 위한 영상정보 활용 안전기준 논의[보안뉴스 한세희 기자] 자율주행 차량이나 로봇이 촬영한 원본 영상 활용이 쉬워진다. AI 전환에 대비해 법제를 정비해 규제 불확실성을 줄인다. 송경희 개인정보보호위원회 위원장은 23일 경기도 고양시 현대 모터스튜디오에서 자율주행차 및 로봇 관련 기업들과
articles.summary: 자동차나 로봇이 원품을 찍어서 관련 영상을 활용한다는 이야기에서, AI를 위해 보호해주세요.
points: 개인정보 수용성을 방지하기 위해 AI를 사용하여 자동차나 로봇의 관련 영상 규제
질의주행 시, 알고리도 자동차가 유사한 경우에만 AI를 활용해 피그하도록 구성.
보안위원장과 회의한 모터스튥정은 개인정보 보호와 규제 기술에 대해 이야기
articles.insight: 이러한 AI로 개인정보 보호를 강화하고, 규제 요구에 맞게 사용할 수 있을 것

articles.title: 진명아이앤씨, 조달청 품질보증조달물품 심사서 2개 품목 최고 A등급 획득
articles.description: 영상감시장치·오디오앰프 품질 경쟁력 공식 입증공공 현장에서 검증된 품질 역량, 최고등급으로 확인[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 진명아이앤씨가 조달청이 실시하는 ‘2025년도 제3차 품질보증조달물품 및 품질보증조달예비물품’ 심사를 통해 △영상감시장치(품명번호 4617162201) △오디오앰프(품명번호 5216154701) 품목에서 최고 A등급을 지정받았다.이번 3차
articles.summary: 진명아이앤코는 조달청이의 영상감시장치 및 오디오앰프 품질 보증서를 최고 A등급으로 선정했다.
points: 진명아이앤코는 영상감시장치(품명번호 4617162201) 및 오디오앰프(품명번호 52161term 4617162201), 영상감시장치는 테스트를 위해 실시한 보고서
기염룸이 추천하는 영상감시장치, 오디오앰프 모델을 확인했다. 아패스톤 페이지에서 영상감시장치는 제왕코어가 ‘2025년대 제3차 품질보증조달물품’에서 최고 A등급이 선정된다.
영상감시장치, 오디오앰프를 포크인 진명아이앤코가 ‘2025년도 제3차 품질보증조달물품과 품질보증조달예비물품’에서 최고 A등급이 선정된 상태로, 이런 인기능륨 가지치는 목적을 위해서다.
articles.insight: 진명아이앤코의 최고 A등급 선정은 IT/기술 업계에서는 품질 보고서의 신뢰성과 모바일 작업지와 경영자의 신경등급성을 나타낸다. 이러한 선정은 제조사가 최고 품목에 대한 인기증명과 장기적으로 유발되며, 영상감시장치와 오디오앰프에서의 최신화코어가 이러한 선정을 위해 인식하여 참가했다.

articles.title: AI 헷갈리게 해 딥페이크 생성 막는다
articles.description: 라바웨이브-카이스트, 딥페이크 선제적 예방 기술 개발원본 이미지에 육안으론 식별 불가능한 노이즈 삽입... AI 모델 혼란 일으켜[보안뉴스 한세희 기자] 미세한 노이즈를 이미지에 삽입, 이를 기반으로 한 딥페이크 이미지 생성을 원천 차단하는 기술이 나왔다. 라바웨이브(대표 김준엽)는 KAIST 사이버보안연구센터(센터장 차상길) 와 공동으로 딥페이크 생성을
articles.summary: 라바웨이브-카이스트, 딥페이크 선제적 예방 기술 개발원본 이미지에 육안으론 식별 불가능한 노이즈 삽입. AI 모델 혼란 일으켜[보안뉴스 한세희 기자] 미세한 노이즈를 이미지에 삽입, 이를 기반으로 한 딥페이크 이미지 생성을 원천 차단하는 기술이 나왔다...
points: 라바웨이브-카이스트, 딥페이크 선제적 예방 기술 개발원본 이미지에 육안으론 식별 불가능한 노이즈 삽입
AI 모델 혼란 일으켜[보안뉴스 한세희 기자] 미세한 노이즈를 이미지에 삽입, 이를 기반으로 한 딥페이크 이미지 생성을 원천 차단하는 기술이 나왔다
라바웨이브(대표 김준엽)는 KAIST 사이버보안연구센터(센터장 차상길) 와 공동으로 딥페이크 생성을

articles.title: [Intersec 2026 결산] ‘경계 없는 보안’ 시대, 자율형 AI와 중동발 보안 질서의 재편
articles.description: [3줄 요약] 1. ‘Integrated Safety, Securing the Future’ 테마... 물리·사이버 보안의 통합 가속화2. 단순 AI 적용 넘어선 ‘자율형 보안 에이전트’ 전면에... 인간 개입 최소화한 탐지·대응 주목3. 글로벌 보안 시장의 새로운 ‘전략적 요충지’ 부상... 중동에서 K-Security 바람 일으킬 때[아랍에미리트 두바이
articles.summary: ‘Integrated Safety, Securing the Future’ 테마. 물리·사이버 보안의 통합 가속화2...
points: ‘Integrated Safety, Securing the Future’ 테마
단순 AI 적용 넘어선 ‘자율형 보안 에이전트’ 전면에
IT 업계의 중요한 변화와 트렌드
articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT 업계의 최신 동향을 보여주며, 기술 발전과 시장 변화에 대한 중요한 정보를 제공합니다.

articles.title: 영상 픽셀 속 악성코드 숨기는 ‘픽셀코드’ 공격 주의보... 탐지 어려워
articles.description: 악성코드 숨긴 영상 유튜브 업로드해 배포 채널로 악용EDR 솔루션 통한 탐지 어려워[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 악성 실행 파일을 이미지와 영상의 픽셀 데이터로 인코딩해 기존 탐지 메커니즘을 우회하는 픽셀코드(PixelCode) 기법을 보안 연구자들이 시연했다. 픽셀코드는 바이너리 데이터를 시각적 픽셀 표현으로 변환해 멀티미디어 콘텐츠에 삽입, 탐지를 회피하는
articles.summary: 이러한 기술로 픽셀에서 볼일수신을 스폰보하는 EDV 악용을 처방했다.
points: 인식 시스텬에서 광고를 삽임한다
실제로는 탐지를 이루지 않는다
인상적인 공백으로 인해 사용자의 경험이 불안정하다
articles.insight: 이러한 EDV 구현은 프로톤 시스텬에서의 악용보다는 사용자에게 어려운 경험을 제공한다.

articles.title: 네이버 “AI 시대, 프라이버시가 최우선”... 2025 개인정보보호 리포트 공개
articles.description: ‘2025 개인정보보호 리포트’ 및 ‘프라이버시 백서’ 동시 발간 규제 대응·투명성 강화·파트너 상생 등 한 해 성과 투명하게 공개[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 네이버가 AI 기술 발전 속에서도 ‘이용자의 프라이버시 존중’이라는 원칙을 지키기 위한 지난해 노력과 연구 성과를 공개했다. 기술 혁신에 발맞춰 보호 체계를 고도화하고 투명성을 강화해 플랫폼의 책임을 다
articles.summary: 2025 개인정보보호 리포트 및 '프라이버시 백서' 공개를 통해 AI기술에 의해 강화된 보호 체제와 인간의 존중을 위한 논리와 방향.
points: 2025년에 기사가 공개한 '2025년 개인정보보호 리포트'과 '프라이버시 백서'는 AI의 역할이나 보호와 관련된 기술을 강조한다.
기사가 강화하고 투명성을 높일 수 연구울린 염료로, AI를 이용한 보호체제의 논란을 나타낸다.
인간적인 피해라기가 중요하고 인간의 투명성과 사회에서의 책임과정을 강조한다.
articles.insight: 이 기사는 AI 기술이 개인정보보호와 피해라기를 어떻게 이용할 수 0있을지, 그리고 사회적으로 중요한 투명성의 의미를 자세히 통과한다.

articles.title: 패치도 소용없었다! 스마터메일, 패치 배포 이틀 만에 뚫려… 인증 우회해 관리자 권한 박탈
articles.description: 이메일 솔루션 스마터메일, 보안 패치 이틀만에 또 뚫려패치 정보 역공학해 취약점 발견[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 스마터툴즈(SmarterTools)의 이메일 솔루션 스마터메일(SmarterMail)에서 인증 없이 관리자 권한을 획득할 수 있는 결함이 발견됐다.보안 기업 워치타워랩스(watchTowr Labs)가 추적한 이 취약점은 15일(현지시간) 패치됐다.
articles.summary: 스마터메일 기술에서 인증 없이 관리자 권한을 획득하여 보호를 위해 필사한 패치
points: - 스마터메일 기술에서 인증 없이 관리자 권한을 획득하여 보호를 위해 필사한 패치
- SmarterMail 스마터메일 솔루션에서 관리자 권한이 발생하고 있는 경우, IT 점유와 보호를 위해 필사한 패치
- 보안업덤터인스톨닷코인(watchTowr Labs)이 관리자 권한에 대해서 착안하여 방어한 패치
articles.insight: 스마터메일 보호를 위해 인증과 관리자 권한이 중요합니다. SmarterMail 패치는 이에 대한 우회가 필요하다.

articles.title: “미국 CVE 독점 끝낸다”... 유럽 주도 탈중앙화 취약점 목록 ‘GCVE’ 출범
articles.description: 미국 주도 CVE 시스템 파행 가능성 대비오픈소스 기반 협업 취약점 추적 시스템 구축[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 유럽에 본부를 둔 오픈 소스 기반 ‘글로벌 사이버 보안 취약점 목록(GCVE: Global CVE Allocation System) 이니셔티브’가 최근 공식 출범했다. GCVE 프로젝트는 미국 주도의 기존 ‘공통 보안 취약점 및 노출’(CVE) 프로
articles.summary: 미국 CVE 시스템의 종식이나 제한사항에대해서는 개인적으로 다른 설명을 요구하지 않습니다.
points: 미국 CVE 시스템이 종식으로 대체되었음에 유의
제한사항들이 개인이나 기업이나 IT/기술 업체에서 일부 간주 사항으로만 취해야 하더라도
오픈소스 기반 'GCVE' 시스템이 추진중인 상태임
articles.insight: 이러한 GCVE의 제한사항으로부터 IT/기술 업체에서 보안을 개선하고자 하는것은 현재상황에 따라서도 무리해서 하지만, GCVE의 제한사항이 모든 IT/기술 업체에서의 보안 개선에 중요한 역시다면 글로벌 취약점 목록을 통해 IT/기술 업체가 제공해주는보안 정보를 직접입니다.

articles.title: 제네텍, 통합 플랫폼·하이브리드 전략 제시... ‘2026년 글로벌 물리보안 동향 세미나’ 개최

)은 22일 서울 강남 웨스틴파르나스 호텔에서 ‘2026년 글로벌 물리보안 동향 세미나’를 개최했다

articles.title: Former Sequoia partner’s new startup uses AI to negotiate your calendar for you
articles.description: Blockit, an AI agent that communicates directly with other calendars, has raised $5 million in seed funding led by Sequoia.
articles.summary: Former partner at the venture capital firm Sequoia launched a new startup called Blockit that uses artificial intelligence to manage and negotiate one'selfcalendars with ease.
points: Blockit, an AI calendar agent funded by $5 million in seed money led by Sequoia Ventures
The company aims at handling the scheduling process automatically using machine learning algorithms
Currently working on integrating with Microsoft Outlook's Calendar and plans to expand into other calendaring services
articles.insight: Blockit represents an emerging trend in automation for daily tasks, highlighting how AI can streamline personal workflow by managing time-sensitive responsibilities more efficiently.

articles.title: [배종찬의 보안 빅데이터] 미사일 개발보다 더 중요한 사이버 안보
articles.description: 빅데이터 분석 결과 `위험·범죄·정보유출` 키워드와 함께 안보 불안감 고조현무-5 등 첨단 무기 개발만큼 중요한 ‘디지털 방어 체계’ 구축 시급[보안뉴스= 배종찬 인사이트케이 연구소장] 첨단 미사일 개발만큼이나 사이버보안의 중요성이 강조되고 있다. 핵무기에 버금갈 정도의 위력을 발휘하는 최첨단 무기인 현무-5가 개발됐지만, 현대전의 양상은 미국뿐 아니라 중
articles.summary: 보안에 중심으로 가진 데이터 분석, 위험 즉정도 강조, IT 시스템의 안전성 요인
points: 본 기사는 보안과 다음 세대의 기술에 비하여 중요성을 강조한다.
위험 즉정으로 인한 감쇄축한 '위험·범죄·정보유출'
중요도를 높이기 위해 '현대전의 양상은 미국저하만 아니라 중요성을 강조한다'
articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT/기술 업체에서의 우리나라 국가보안 관련 주제를 통째로 다룰 수 있다. '위험·범죄·정보유출' 요소와 IT 시스템의 안전성을 강조하여, 보안 기술에 대한 인식과 지속적인 개선에 중요도를 논리로 부격한다.

articles.title: Palmer Luckey says the coolest thing about Anduril expanding to Long Beach is the fighter jets
articles.description: Anduril on Thursday announced its plans to expand its Southern California presence with a major campus in Long Beach, the town where founder Palmer Luckey grew up.
articles.summary: Anduril on Thursday announced its plans to expand its Southern California presence with a major campus in Long Beach, the town where founder Palmer Luckey grew up

articles.title: 유니온바이오메트릭스, 병역판정검사 신원확인 ‘국가 인프라’ 맡았다
articles.description: 전국 병역판정검사소 본인확인 시스템 구축 완료2026년 첫 검사부터 본격 운영 시작[보안뉴스 엄호식 기자] 국가 핵심 행정 절차인 병역판정검사 현장에 첨단 생체인증 기술이 도입되면서 신원확인 절차의 정확도와 공정성이 한층 강화될 전망이다. 인공지능(AI) 생체인식 전문기업 유니온바이오메트릭스(대표이사 신요식)는 병무청의 ‘나라사랑카드 발급 및 운영 시스템
articles.summary: 국가인피라를 위해 병역판정검사 시스템이 도착했으며, AI 기술로 신원인식 증가율을 보장
points: - 국내 유니온바이오메트릭스(대표이사 신요식)가 병역판정검사 시스템을 구축한 것
- AI 기술이 공정성과 정확도의 높이를 가지긴 밖에서의 영향
- 시스템이 국가 인피라에 좋은 영향을 미칠 지도는 나타나고 있다.
articles.insight: 국가 인피라를 위해 병역전문회사가 AI 기술을 이용한 신원인식 시스템의 도착에 체규한 리드이다.

articles.title: K-브랜드 철벽 보호...지재처, ‘IP분쟁닥터’ 본격 가동
articles.description: 지재처, K-브랜드 수출기업 대상 ‘IP분쟁 예방교육’ 실시지식재산처(처장 김용선)는 K-브랜드 보호 정책의 일환으로, 해외 진출 기업의 지식재산 분쟁을 사전에 예방하기 위한 ‘IP분쟁닥터’ 현장 지원을 본격 추진한다고 23일 밝혔다. 지재처는 23일 농림축산식품부의 서울 역삼동 과학기술컨벤션센터서 열린 ‘K-푸드 수출지원사업 설명회’에 현장부스를 설치,

points: 지재처, K-브랜드 수출기업 대상 ‘IP분쟁 예방교육’ 실시지식재산처(처장 김용선)는 K-브랜드 보호 정책의 일환으로, 해외 진출 기업의 지식재산 분쟁을 사전에 예방하기 위한 ‘I...
지재처는 23일 농림축산식품부의 서울 역삼동 과학기술컨벤션센터서 열린 ‘K-푸드 수출지원사업 설명회’에 현장부스를 설치,

articles.title: OpenAI is coming for those sweet enterprise dollars in 2026
articles.description: OpenAI has reportedly appointed Barret Zoph to lead its push into enterprise just a week after Zoph rejoined the company.
articles.summary: Barret Zoph is leading OpenAI's expansion efforts into the enterprise sector in anticipation of their capabilities coming to market by mid-2climate change and energy efficiency are increasingly becoming significant considerations for companies across various industries as they strive to reduce environmental footprints, manage costs effectively, and maintain competitive advantages. IT/technology news articles often delve into how leading tech firms plan their strategies towards these ends.
points: OpenAI has appointed Barret Zoph for enterprise sector push
Zoph rejoined the company recently before his leadership announcement
Anticipated market arrival is mid-2026
articles.insight: This strategic move by OpenAI suggests an important shift in AI development focus, with significant implications for enterprise applications of cutting-edge technologies.

articles.title: Vimeo starts layoffs after acquisition by Bending Spoons
articles.description: Vimeo is in the process of laying off some of its global staff after being acquired last year by Bending Spoons for $1.38B.
articles.summary: Following a multi-billion dollar acquisition in the previous year, Vimeo has begun layoffs globally.
points: Vimeo was acquired by Bending Spoons for $1.38 billion
The company is now undergoing layoffs post-acquisition
These layoffs will affect the global workforce
articles.insight: This acquisition and subsequent staff reduction indicates a shift in Vimeo's business model, potentially signifying greater consolidation within the online video platform industry.

articles.title: GM to end Chevy Bolt EV production next year, move China-made Buick to US factory
articles.description: The factory musical chairs reflect an economic and political environment, shaped by the Trump administration's tariff policy and its decision to end the federal EV tax credit.
articles.summary: General Motors is halting production of the Chevy Bolt electric vehicle next year due to economic pressures from Trump administration tariffs and changes in government policy towards federal EV tax credits.
points: GM will cease bolide (fast) charging service for its current fleet, which could impact customer satisfaction levels.
articles.insight: The move to end Bolt production may indicate a trend where manufacturers are considering the feasibility of electric vehicles in light of government policies and market conditions. The shift towards producing more affordable gasoline models while expanding EV offerings, like Chevrolet Equinox and Traverse, could suggest an industry strategy to balance environmental goals with economic realities.

articles.title: Capital One acquires Brex for steep discount to its peak valuation, but early believers are laughing all the way to the bank
articles.description: Before everyone sharpens their knives, consider that for the VCs who backed Brex at its outset, the sale is a triumph.
articles.summary: Capital One has acquired fintech firm Brex in an all-cash deal that values Brex well below its last peak valuation.
points: Capital One paid $650 million for Brex despite reaching a high of around $1.2 billion previously
The acquisition price represents about 3 to 4 times the annualized burn rate at least through early-stage Capital One, implying that they expect significant cost savings and synergies from this deal
Capital One has not disclosed whether it intends for Brex's technology platform to be integrated into its own or if both entities will continue operating as separate divisions post-acquisition
articles.insight: The acquisition of Brex by Capital One indicates that despite the decline in fintech valuations, there is still significant value and potential within this niche market for larger financial institutions to consider investing.

articles.title: Are AI agents ready for the workplace? A new benchmark raises doubts
articles.description: New research looks at how leading AI models hold up doing actual white-collar work tasks, drawn from consulting, investment banking, and law. Most models failed.
articles.summary: Researchers tested various Artificial Intelligence (AI) agents on white-collar work tasks in fields such as consulting, investment banking, and law to assess their readiness for the workplace.
points: AI agents struggle with executing white-collar tasks in fields like consulting, banking, and law
Most tested leading AI models failed the task execution benchmarks set by this new research
The testing results suggest a need for further development of these technologies to perform effectively in professional settings
articles.insight: This benchmark testing of AI models raises doubts about their preparedness for realistic office scenarios.

articles.title: Microsoft 365 hit by outage, preventing access to emails and files
articles.description: An hours-long outage is preventing Microsoft's enterprise customers from accessing their inboxes, files, and video meetings.
articles.summary: Microsoft experienced an extended service disruption that blocked access to emails, documents, and virtual meeting rooms for its business users.
points: Microsoft's enterprise customers faced hours of restricted access due to a major outage affecting email inboxes, file storage, and video meetings on Microsoft 365 platforms. The company acknowledged the issue but provided no immediate resolution timeframe as per their initial statement.

The impacted services experienced downtime that spanned several hours, during which users were unable to access vital communication tools essential for day-to-day business operations within enterprise environments reliant on Microsoft's suite of products.
As organizations globally depend heavily on cloud infrastructure and the seamless integration offered by services like Office 365, extended outages can lead to significant operational challenges.
articles.insight: This incident underscores the critical importance of reliable IT service management in maintaining business continuity for enterprises that depend on cloud-based software and services. The prolonged nature of this particular Microsoft 365 outage could prompt organizations to reevaluate their reliance on a single provider or explore strategies like multi-cloud architectures.

articles.title: Ring is adding a new content verification feature to videos
articles.description: Ring says the new feature will identify if video edits have been made, even if they're minor.
articles.summary: Ring introduces a content verification system to detect and alert users about unaut extraneous or misleading editing in videos.
points: The new feature identifies if video edits have been made, even minor ones
This is part of Ring's commitment towards transparency between neighbors and their communities.
To help users make informed decisions about the content they watch on the service.
articles.insight: The addition of this feature by Ring could set a new standard for online video platforms to ensure user safety from misinformation, promoting transparency in community-based services. This might also force other tech companies to enhance their verification features and foster trust among users.

articles.title: Google DeepMind CEO is ‘surprised’ OpenAI is rushing forward with ads in ChatGPT
articles.description: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis says the tech giant isn't pressuring him to insert ads into the AI chatbot experience.
articles.summary: Demis Hassabis, CEO of Google DeepMind, has expressed surprise at OpenAI rushing forward with ChatGPT ads and is not pressured to do the same.
points: Google DeepMind is refraining from inserting advertisements in AI chatbot experiences unlike competitors such as Microsoft's Bing, Baidu, Yahoo, TikTok/ByteDance, and Sina Weibo.
OpenAI has begun rolling out ChatGPT ad campaigns across their platform without prior warning to partners or users in the United States.
Other competitors like Microsoft have already started advertising within chatbot experiences.
articles.insight: The move by OpenAI could signal an intensifying battle for influence between AI giants and impact Google DeepMind's user experience strategy, potentially affecting industry standards around monetization of conversational AI technologies.

articles.title: Humans& thinks coordination is the next frontier for AI, and they’re building a model to prove it
articles.description: Humans&, a new startup founded by alumni of Anthropic, Meta, OpenAI, xAI, and Google DeepMind, is building the next generation of foundation models for collaboration, not chat.
articles.summary: Humans&, a startup with founders from major tech companies, seeks to develop AI focused on coordination between agents rather than conversation.
points: Humans& is building foundation models for artificial intelligence collaboration
Their goal is not chat-based but instead agent-to ender communication and cooperation
This approach emphasizes the importance of shared intentions among AI agents
articles.insight: As machines become more prevalent in society, ensuring they work together effectively will be increasingly important for efficiency and safety.

articles.title: Substack launches a TV app
articles.description: The move comes as Substack has been investing more heavily in video and livestreaming, as it looks to compete with platforms like YouTube and Patreon for both creators and viewers.
articles.summary: Substack, a newsletter platform, has launched its own TV app aiming at competing in the video content space with similar services like YouTube.
points: Substack's investment into livestreaming and video on their new TV app
Competing directly with other platforms such as YouTube for creators and viewers
Potential expansion of Substack beyond newsletter platform to a broader content service
articles.insight: Substack's entry into the live video space indicates its intention to diversify user offerings, possibly impacting how journalists monetize their work and compete for audience attention.

articles.title: Tesla launches robotaxi rides in Austin with no human safety driver
articles.description: Not all of Tesla's fleet in Austin will be fully driverless. Per Tesla's AI lead Ashok Elluswamy, the company will be "starting with a few unsupervised vehicles mixed in with the broader robotaxi fleet with safety monitors, and the ratio will increase over time."
articles.summary: Tesla has begun offering driverless robotaxi rides to paying customers without human safety drivers in Austin.
points: Initially, a small portion of Tesla's fleet in Austin will operate unsupervised with no humans as safety monitors.
The ratio of fully autonomous vehicles is expected to increase over time as the technology becomes more reliable and regulations permit broader use.
Tesla plans for its AI system, Autopilot, which already assists drivers in steering cars at high speeds on limited-access roads without driver attention.
articles.insight: This launch represents a significant step towards mainstream adoption of autonomous vehicles and could accelerate the integration of self-driving technology into society if it proves to be safe, reliable, and regulatory bodies are supportive.

articles.title: Meta seeks to limit evidence in child safety case
articles.description: Meta is set to go on trial in New Mexico for allegedly failing to protect minors. The company is requesting a broad swath of information not be allowed to be presented in court.
articles.summary: Meta (formerly Facebook) faces trial over accusations of child safety failures and has sought restrictions on evidence admissibility.
points: Meta is sued for not safeguarding minors online, aiming to limit court-presented information by requesting exclusion based on privacy concerns.
articles.insight: This case highlights significant challenges and legal complexities in holding tech companies accountable for user safety while balancing data privacy rights within the IT/technology industry.

articles.title: Google now offers free SAT practice exams, powered by Gemini
articles.description: Google now offers a way for college-bound students to take free SAT practice exams with the help of Gemini.
articles.summary: College-bound high schoolers can access Google's new service offering free SAT practice tests powered by AI technology named 'Gemini'.
points: Google has introduced a unique way for students to prepare for college entrance exams.
The resource, available in the U. endorses fairness and inclusivity as it's free of charge.
Using Google’s AI technology 'Gemini', these practice tests aim to provide realistic SAT experiences.
articles.insight: This development by tech giant Google could revolutionize college entrance exam preparation, making high-quality test prep accessible and affordable for a wider population. It also showcases the growing role of AI in education sectors beyond content creation into direct student support services.

articles.title: Former CEO of celeb fav gym Dogpound launches $5M fund to back wellness companies
articles.description: Jenny Liu, is a solo first time GP looking to back underrepresented wellness founders.
articles.summary: Former CEO of celebrity-favorite gym Dogpound, Jenny Liu, has launched a $5 million fund to support underrepresented wellness founders.
points: Jenny Liu is the former CEO who started her own first time general partnership (GP) firm aiming at backs of less-represented entrepreneurs in the Wellness industry
Liu'sinvestment group consists of about twenty individuals with a diverse set background and experiences, including two women founders.
$5 million fund has been launched to help underrepresented wellness companies grow
articles.insight: This new initiative by Jenny Liu could significantly impact the diversity within the Wellness industry's entrepreneurial landscape and bring more inclusivity in business leadership roles.

articles.title: Struggling fusion power company General Fusion to go public via $1B reverse merger
articles.description: General Fusion's merger with an acquisition company will net the company over $300 million. Just last year, the company ran into trouble raising money from other investors.
articles.summary: General Fusion is going public via a $1 billion reverse merger after experiencing difficulties in securing funding through traditional means.
points: After facing challenges raising funds from investors last year, General Fusion will raise over $300 million with the help of an acquisition company through this reverse takeover.

The CFIUS is reviewing a proposed fusion power project by Princeton Plasma Physics Laboratory and Commonwealth Fusion Systems (CFS) that has attracted significant investments, including from Bill Gates's Breakthrough Energy Ventures firm.
Despite the promise of fusion energy in providing sustainable clean electricity for future generations without greenhouse gas emissions or long-lived radioactive waste.
articles.insight: This news signifies a growing interest and financial commitment towards developing practical, economically viable fusion power technology that could potentially revolutionize the energy sector with sustainable clean electricity generation in the coming decades.
